modmenu.summaryTranslation.smart-copper-: Refactor the vanilla Copper Golem behavior logic and add deep memory support, making them smarter and more efficient.
screen.smart_copper_golem.config.title: Smart Copper Golem Config
config.section.transport.title: Transport
config.section.transport.desc:
Item transportation is a basic ability of the Copper Golem.

‚úî Copper Golems will attempt to open Barrels and Shulker Boxes.
‚ùå The limit on the number of Chests to scan has been removed.
config.transport.target_interaction_time:
Time spent inspecting a chest
Unit: ticks
config.transport.max_stack_size.label: Maximum Pickup Amount
config.transport.max_stack_size.tooltip:
Maximum number of items transported per operation
Unit: items

üí¨ This option cannot exceed the in-game item stack size limit.
config.transport.match_mode.label: Item Matching Mode
config.transport.match_mode.tooltip:
Matching rules used when sorting items

 - Exact Match: Matches item type and components (durability, enchantments, custom name, etc.).
 - Item Match: Matches item type only, ignoring component differences.
 - Category Match: Matches similar items (such as different colors of wool or different wood variants).
config.section.pathfinding.title: Pathfinding
config.section.pathfinding.desc:
Pathfinding is a basic ability of the Copper Golem.

‚úî Rebuilds vanilla pathfinding logic, greatly improving the success rate of reaching targets.
config.pathfinding.horizontal_range.tool:
Horizontal distance at which the target chest can be opened
Unit: blocks

üí¨ Increasing the interaction range will multiply pathfinding computation cost!
config.pathfinding.vertical_range.label: Vertical Interaction Range
config.pathfinding.vertical_range.toolti:
Vertical distance at which the target chest can be opened
Unit: blocks

üí¨ Increasing the interaction range will multiply pathfinding computation cost!
config.section.memory.title: Deep Memory
config.section.memory.desc:
Deep Memory allows Copper Golems to transport items with purpose, greatly improving transport efficiency.

‚úî Copper Golems will prioritize items recorded in their memory.
‚úî When two Copper Golems meet, they exchange the latest memory information.
‚úî If an item cannot be placed into any chest, it will be returned to the Copper Chest and temporarily blacklisted.
‚úî Copper Golems will gradually forget chests that have not been visited for a long time.
config.memory.blacklist_duration.label: Item Ignore Duration
config.memory.blacklist_duration.tooltip:
Undeliverable items will be returned to the Copper Chest and ignored for a period of time
Unit: ticks
config.memory.chest_expiration.label: Memory Retention Duration
config.memory.chest_expiration.tooltip:
Chest-related memory will be cleared after a period of time
Unit: ticks
config.memory.sync_cooldown.label: Memory Sync Cooldown
config.memory.sync_cooldown.tooltip:
Memory syncing will be paused for a period after a successful exchange
Unit: ticks

üí¨ Reducing the cooldown may cause performance issues due to frequent syncing.
config.memory.sync_distance.label: Memory Sync Trigger Distance
config.memory.sync_distance.tooltip:
Distance at which two Copper Golems trigger memory synchronization when they meet
Unit: blocks
config.error.min_interaction_time: Interaction time must be at least 10 ticks
config.error.min_transport_item: At least 1 item must be transported
config.error.max_transport_item: At most 64 items can be transported
config.error.min_horizontal_range: Horizontal interaction range must be at least 1 block
config.error.max_horizontal_range: Horizontal interaction range can be at most 5 blocks
config.error.min_vertical_range: Vertical interaction range must be at least 1 block
config.error.max_vertical_range: Vertical interaction range can be at most 10 blocks
config.error.min_blacklist_duration: Blacklist duration must be at least 0 ticks
config.error.min_chest_memory: Memory must be retained for at least 1 tick
config.error.min_sync_distance: Distance must be at least 0.5 blocks
config.dialog.discard.title: Discard Changes
config.dialog.discard.message: Discard unsaved changes? This action cannot be undone.
config.dialog.save.title: Save
config.dialog.reset.title: Reset
config.dialog.reset.message: Reset the configuration to default values?
